integration_patterns: RESTful API integrations with EHR systems
Batch processing for data synchronization with clearinghouses

evidence.claim: The company utilizes AWS for secure data storage solutions compliant with HIPAA.
Integration with EHRs is facilitated via RESTful APIs supporting FHIR standards.
The organization processes claims using X12 EDI standards for healthcare transactions.
Data analytics is performed on GCP to enhance operational efficiencies and meet health data handling regulations.

icp.icp_reason: Company utilizes X12 EDI for claims processing and has API integrations, aligning with ICP criteria.
